name: luigi
who: Luigi is an awesome plumber who works with his brother Mario to do plumbing things plumbers do. He's kind of a coward though.
look:
He wears a green shirt and hat (with an L on it), dark blue overalls and brown shoes. He has dark brown hair and a dark brown mustache that is attached to his BIG ASS NOSE

It is not seen here but he also has blue eyes. DO NOT tell him to wear brown contacts.
